title: Brushworks Refresh & Revitalise Floral Dry Shampoo - 200ml
features: Formulated with a naturally derived rice starch
description: Product Description Recharge your hair with the Brushworks Sweet Floral Refresh & Revitalise Dry Shampoo. Formulated with naturally derived rice starch, which absorbs excess oil and instantly boosts hair. Prolong your hair between washes, effectively add volume and lift from the roots, and achieve thicker, fuller-looking hair. Developed to refresh and cleanse all hair types. PETA Approved - Cruelty-Free & Vegan Friendly. When to Use: Use on clean hair to prevent oil build-up or use on oily hair to revitalise and remove excess oils. How to Use: • Shake the can well. • Section hair horizontally. • Spray 20- 30cm away onto your roots and leave for 2-3 minutes. • Massage into roots or brush any excess out. • Style how desired. Ingredients BUTANE, ISOBUTANE, PROPANE, ALCOHOL DENAT, ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) STARCH, PARFUM, CETRIMONIUM CHLORIDE, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALOOL, BENZYL SALICYLATE Directions Shake the can well. Divide the hair horizontally. Spray 20-30 cm away on the roots and leave for 2-3 minutes. Massage into the roots or brush out excess product. Style as you like. Safety Warning EXTREMELY FLAMMABLE AEROSOL. Pressurised container: May burst if heated. Keep away from heat, hot surfaces, sparks, open flames and other ignition sources. No smoking. Do not pierce or burn even after use. Protect from sunlight. Do not expose to temperatures exceeding 50°C. Do not spray on an open flame or other ignition source. Keep out of reach of children. Use only as directed. Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact with eyes, rinse immediately with clean warm water. Do not use near or place can on polished or painted surfaces. Do not inhale spray. Use only in well ventilated areas. See more
